headline: Ohio first lady Fran DeWine tests positive for COVID-19, governor's office says
author: Laura A. Bischoff
sentences: This infusion "can block the virus that causes COVID-19 from entering cells in your body and limit the amount of the virus within your body," according to the U.S. Department of Health and Human Services.

Laura Bischoff is a reporter for the USA TODAY Network Ohio Bureau, which serves the Columbus Dispatch, Cincinnati Enquirer, Akron Beacon Journal and 18 other affiliated news organizations across Ohio.
